feed.title: Albert Villanova del Moral
feed.subtitle: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning and Data Science consultant.

entry.title: sqlite3: SQLite in Python
entry.summary: The Python Standard Library contains a module that provides an SQL interface with the DB-API 2.0 specification: sqlite3. It requires SQLite 3.7.15 or newer.

entry.title: Git: Install a GitHub Pull Request

link.title: Git: Install a GitHub Pull Request

entry.summary: To install a GitHub Pull Request: python -m pip install git+ssh://git@github.com/{org-or-username}/{repo}.git@refs/pull/{ID}/head#egg={package-name}

entry.title: Git: Revert to a previous commit

link.title: Git: Revert to a previous commit

entry.summary: Note that this is like reset but for public branches.

entry.title: Git: Pull a GitHub Pull Request

link.title: Git: Pull a GitHub Pull Request

entry.summary: To pull a GitHub Pull Request pull/{ID} into a local branch named pr/{ID}:

entry.title: Git: reset commit date
entry.summary: To reset the last commit date (both author and committer dates, which are the same within a local repo): git commit --amend --no-edit --reset-author
